Mod5_Description: Damaging enemies with {c_important}Charge{/c} makes them {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[SF_18]{/c} seconds.
Mod3_Description: Enemies who are Knocked Back into terrain by {c_important}Charge{/c} take {c_number}{payload:TOOLTIP_IMPACT_WALL}{/c} damage and are Stunned for {c_number}{SF_11}{/c} seconds.
Mod4_Description: Reduce {c_important}Charge's{/c} Cooldown by {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} seconds if it Knocks Back an enemy into terrain.
simple_desc: Charge forward and push enemies with you.
name: Charge
